author: A_Brickset_user
title: Good great and gorgeous
review: I have bought it for 40% of the original prize. The figs are good, the mountain with river is almost perfect. Only there is no inventory in the tipi's. The Riverground is very good. You can make a river with more of these sets.

author: smiley905
title: nice set.
review: this setis great and i think it has plenty detail. my favorite part is the totompole on top of the mountain. if you pull somthing the logs will drop into the river and the teepees are great. the little look out isnt that great but its a nice addition. i like the river peice and the mountain blocks. this set is worth getting and ive injoyed playing with it.

author: Planetsbend
title: One of the Greats!
review: This being my very first big set, I greatly enjoyed building it and playing with it. The detail on the teepees, the hollowed out trunks, the shrubs, all contributed to my liking. The amount of time I spent playing with this set greatly advanced my knowledge of how to put legos together in order to hold. Even my family members enjoyed pulling all the traps and spending time with it. If you ever find this on ebay, bid on it, you will be happy you did.
